website_summaries.verdict: A general comfort foam donut pillow with an oval shape for better support and coverage around the tailbone.
pros: Multiuse design works well for relieving hemorrhoid, prostatitis, pregnancy, and lower back pains
Dense foam and fabric is easy to clean and provides a non-slip surface
cons: The smaller profile of the pillow may be uncomfortable to larger sized users

customer_reviews.title: Can't return it and can't use it :(
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and bought this to help me with pain in buttox area but this cushion is only good on hard floor and on the office chair and even my car I feel like this is even causing more discomfort. I barely used it but just realized can't even return it! This is a prime item I don't understand why I just can't return it like any other prime item. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: a buyer

customer_reviews.title: MOLDED CUSHION!!!
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETELY UPSET AND DISAPPOINTED. Do NOT purchase. If I could pick no stars I would. I tried giving this company the benefit of the doubt but after two orders, I was still dealing with the same thing. The cushion under the zipper was rotted or molded for my first order.I was unable to get the second order to ship faster even though I was in so much pain and willing to try the same product again. Once the second order came, the foam also had mold. I am definitely not satisfied with my two purchases.
customer_reviews.author: jfam

customer_reviews.title: Miricle After Hemmroid Procedure
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for 5'1, 120 lbs female Hard on the under thighs, takes getting use to Fits well around the bottom area Works well for 5'8, 165 lbs male After procedure, relieves pressure while sitting. Able to sit for hours Useful for driving Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Big ol booty --- it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this was going to be too small for my big ol behind but it wasn't! Sure, it flattens pretty darn good when I sit on it but there must be enough clearance so that there is relief for my tailbone. I sit for up to 6 hours on it and I'm a big girl.. so far it's totally working. Definitely get this one if you are unsure about your size and if it will hold up. Works!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: LIke A Rock
customer_reviews.text: This device, the Kieba donut, was a total washout for me. It was hard, hard, making it extremely uncomfortable. After trying to u se iit over a period o two days, I put t back in its box and hid it in the closet. My purpose in ordering this item was to help alleviate pain in my tailbone. Sitting on the donut aggravated my problem. Perhaps I misunderstood the purpose of the product.
customer_reviews.author: elbow

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: He said it was ok. Much firmer than we thought it would. Seems to be very well made. UPDATE: within 24 hours of my review(above) Jennifer from Customer Service contacted me and offered to replace the pillow immediately. I received it the next day. The replacement doesn’t seem to as firm as the first one which is a good thing. Jennifer also advised me that there was no need to return the first pillow. Very impressed with the response.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Actually it's a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: No candy colors on this ring but it's been a quality-of-life saver. Recovering from prostate surgery and pretty miserable I remembered ads from long ago for hemorrhoid cushions and thought I'd take a chance. Felt goofy ordering it, felt VERY clever when there was suddenly a bearable position besides lying down. It's very comfortable, seems very well-made and durable so when medical problems are a distant memory I'll still be putting this donut between my bony butt and the sadistic benches at the Hollywood Bowl. If you're miserable enough to consider it you sohuld be embarrassed only if you don't order it.
customer_reviews.author: braz

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, greater company
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow because I had surgery and had to stay in bed for an extended time, and wanted to guarantee my comfort. At first, this seemed a bit too stiff compared to other pillows I've used before. But it works just fine and kept me comfortable during my recovery. The company notified me that there was a quality control issue with some of their pillows, so they were replacing all pillows sold. They sent me a brand new pillow very quickly, along with a personalized, signed letter. That's pretty incredible these days, in my experience. Their communication was excellent, and the customer service impeccable. So I am very satisfied with the pillow and the company.
customer_reviews.author: catzmother

customer_reviews.title: Great support department...
customer_reviews.text: My wife recommended that i purchase this product to help me recovering from my surgery in the rectal area. After trying it out for two days, I'm not sure if this is the right product for me or whether it's a defected product. It seems to shift the pain from the rectal area to other areas that come in contact with the donut. I contacted Jennifer in the support department about this issue. She promptly offered me full refund for the trouble. So even though the product didn't help with my issue, the support department was very helpful and responsive to help me. The rating would have been a 5-star if the product had worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: jason tran

customer_reviews.title: Literally saved my butt on a 10-hour overnight flight.
customer_reviews.text: Having recently developed tailbone pain that made sitting uncomfortable, even on comfy couches, I was terrified of flying overseas on an overnight 10 hour flight. Airplane seats are not known for their comfort! I ordered this and crossed my fingers, and it worked out brilliantly. It took a little bit of practice to figure out where to sit on the cushion, but I made it through the flight with no issue. My tailbone felt fine! I'd HIGHLY recommend this product if you have similar pain, and definitely this product over other U-shaped pillows (I have a tempur-pedic one as well that doesn't work as well for long-hauls) because the foam in it doesn't get soft and lose support.
customer_reviews.author: Analytics Guy

customer_reviews.title: I have IBS and a few "butt buddies" as I like to call them that flare up sometimes and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful when I have issues. I have IBS and a few "butt buddies" as I like to call them that flare up sometimes and it has, at times, been impossible for me to sit in my work chair. Having this for those days is super helpful. Not the most comfortable for all the time but MUCH more comfortable than putting pressure on a butt buddy. D:
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. The manufacturer sent me a new one at no charge after I posted a first review giving it 2 stars because the first unit the shipped to me was hard. The replacement one is good and not hard. The manufacturer/seller obviously takes pride in their product and stands behind it. Recommend to all. Well done Kieba.
customer_reviews.author: straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Better right away.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I sat on this cushion I knew it would work way better than my old one did. My old one was well made and looked like it was shaped for maximum comfort....but it was too hard to be comfortable....like sitting on a bench. The Kieba is soft and molds itself to your shape while being supportive as it protects your sensitive parts. I would recommend it to anyone as well as buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fedance

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cushion to help with prostatitis during long drives. This cushion was very uncomfortable and I do not recommend for this condition. I spend about 4 hours a day in a car driving.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice foam donut cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foam donut cushion for my elderly father suffering from tailbone discomfort when sitting. He has only been using the donut cushion for a few days but has noticed significant improvement in his discomfort. I like the ability to be able to remove the outside covering on the cushion (which has a zipper) so it can be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Babs55

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for me as a plus size person
customer_reviews.text: For me, this was really uncomfortable as a plus size person. So uncomfortable as to be unusuable. I have no idea how it's so highly rated, but maybe it works better for regular sized people. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is described!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helps with relieving the pressure from sitting down. Even if I do stand, I tend to get some pressure in my lower back sometimes. The foam of the cushion is quite firm, but it's not too firm to make it uncomfortable to sit on it. It's exactly what is described. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nami San

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I buy a donut to use after a car accident that left me with a spine and coccyx injury. This donut was and is the best! Sitting on any surface wasn’t easy during the first months of my injury and with this donut I was able to sit for longer periods of time and not be uncomfortable. My back is getting better but I am still using the donut! It’s that good.
customer_reviews.author: PamelaV

customer_reviews.title: WORKS REALLY WELL FOR ME SO FAR !
customer_reviews.text: THIS REALLY HELPS ME,AS I FELL & BROKE MY TAIL BONE. IT IS VERY PAINFUL TO FIND A WAY TO SIT COMFORTABLE ? I FOUND THIS WORKS FOR ME WELL! THE ONLY THING TO WATCH IS MAKE CERTAIN WHERE THIS IS AT ON THE SEAT YOU ARE ABOUT TO SIT IN! IF IT IS TOO CLOSE TO THE EDGE ,YOU COULD SLID OFF INTO THE FLOOR! BAD FOR INJURED TAIL BONE !
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, jury still out on comfort possiblities!
customer_reviews.text: Item looks nice and does stay in place. First thing I noticed was the very strong chemical smell. It does diminish after a couple days in the car. Initially seems pretty hard I am hoping that it would soften in a week or so of use. I utilize in my car since I am there about 8 hrs a day and after about 30 min I start to feel numbness in my upper thighs. I think this has to do with the hardness I spoke of and again after I break it in I hope that does go away or I will be returning. I don't want to create another issue while trying to solve another.
customer_reviews.author: Racinwith8

customer_reviews.title: Not just for hemorrhoid sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for exercise. Really, I did! Miranda Esmonde-White recommended it in one of her videos to isolate the glutes when you're lying on one side and flinging the other leg around. Really helps with stability and targeting the right muscle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased for a relative right after she gave birth. Let's just say from the expression on her face the first time she was able to sit comfortably, you would have thought she'd won the lottery AND just eaten at the finest restaurant in the world. Cushion seems to be holding up well, does not attract dust or lint.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Fung

customer_reviews.title: Sweet relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had prostate surgery and was having issues sitting on surfaces (hard or padded). The cushion brought immediate relief. I've even been able to drive in comfort over the pothole and crack ridden surfaces in Tucson:-) It allows me to sit for prolonged periods and has made life much less uncomfortable. The cushion arrive as scheduled, and of course it was in great shape. I highly recommend this product and this company. Thanks Kieba.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and won’t deflate
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently had surgery and was struggling to find a comfortable cushion. He tried the inflatable donut that only lasted a week before leaking and a stadium cushion that provided almost no comfort. He’s very happy with your cushion. He had an all-day meeting for work today, his first full day since his surgery, and he was dreading being uncomfortable but the cushion worked great and he attended the whole meeting. It’s the perfect combination of firmness but has enough give so it’s not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts off circulation
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this worked for me, but unfortunately it in itself caused more issues than it solved. I was only able to sit on this for about 5 minutes before it would start cutting off circulation and become unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Fishntime

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my father-in-law
customer_reviews.text: My 99 year old father-in-law has been suffering with pain when he sits, and unfortunately he sits most of the day. We did some research and decided on this product, had it delivered to him, and he absolutely loves it! I only wish this product was available in Canada. It was quite expensive with the exchange rate and the shipping and handling, but he assures me it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Kieba cushion for Prostate problems
customer_reviews.text: This cushion has provided a great deal of comfort for my husband. Now he can sit and watch TV, before he had to stay in bed. Thank you for providing it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Pudendal Nerve Pain
customer_reviews.text: For my issues, this pillow is not helpful. I have yet to find one that is. I have Pudendal nerve pain and sitting is very painful. I need to just try making one myself. The cushion itself is a bit hard. I need one that has a little bit wider and longer opening and then maybe it might help.
customer_reviews.author: debramac54

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the comfort of a cushion of this shape. But that has turned out be a non-issue. I have used this cushion in my office chair, in the car as driver and in different chairs at my church. It did the job quite well in all cases. I have had negative experience with "memory foam" and products that emit a strong toxic smell. I am happy to confirm that this is one of the few products that have none of those problems.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Ihrig

customer_reviews.title: Still a Pain in the Nether Regions
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my desk a lot and over the past few months have developed a ache in my coccyx. After reading reviews on Amazon and other sites the "Kieba Hemorrhoid Treatment Donut Tailbone Cushion" had the best reviews. Using it in my desk chair for the past several days I've had no relief from that dull ache and I'm back to using pillows. So much for reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JimR

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 92 year old mom's wheelchair. She LOVES it. She says she's comfortable all day in her chair now - after suffering for years from sciatica back pain. Only wish I had bought it sooner.. Thank you for this great cushion that really helps people.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: My backside is grateful for this donut. I've used it at my computer, on my exercise bike and on the couch. If you're interested in never needing one of these, and you're a woman of childbearing age, I might suggest having a C-section or adoption as an alternative to the bunghole issues pushing out a human will invariably cause. Don't get me wrong, I love my kid beyond any possible measure. I'm just sayin ;)
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: THIS MADE MY LIFE WORTH LIVING POSTPARTUM. Bought this not knowing how much happiness and comfort it would bring to my life. Very easy to transport around so when I went to my sons first doctors appointment three days after delivery it was easy to carry to the car and around the office so I could sit comfortably anywhere. Love love love this. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mangum

customer_reviews.title: The Best Yet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different tailbone relief pillows and found this to be the most comfortable and pain relieving. For instance the pillow made by "Ever Lasting Comfort" is not nearly as comfortable as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good. "Supportive"
customer_reviews.text: It is really firm. It may be too firm. It is doing the job. Could be more cushiony. My butt hurts either way😔
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Salem

customer_reviews.title: 18" wide, comfortable, well shaped - good product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It's the widest one I could find on Amazon - 18" wide is a lot better than 15" wide for an averaged sized man like me. Some reviewers say it's too hard but I find it comfortable even for long stretches of time. I have an issue near my coccyx so the indentations front and back are perfect. I didn't like using it on a big easy chair because it shifted my position in a way that made my back hurt after a while, but I love it on my desk chair. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Omgosh I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PILLOW!!! Why didn't I purchase this sooner, or with the first baby! I'm 30wks pregnant, 175 pounds and this pillow is a dream! Has not flattened on me once, even if I sit for an extended period of time. It's also not too hard, I think it's just right. It saves my bum and helps with back pain! I can only imagine it will be a life saver post baby. This is a must have if you're pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for my 15 hour flight!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow made my 15 hour flight a breeze! I have tried few options in the past for the office, and didn't get much relife, I almost reached the conclusion that there is no hope :-) until I purchased this pillow! Made my flight in economy a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Levy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity when had hemorrhoids removed late in pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from hemorrhoids throughout my second pregnancy and they were incredibly painful. I also had a 2 year old that I stayed home with and was playing on the floor with. Towards the end I could not sit at all without this pillow, it was a lifesaver. I had my hemorrhoids removed when I was 37 1/2 weeks pregnant (horribly painful, avoid at all costs if you can while pregnant), but again I used this and it helped my recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardest Donut Pillow Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this hemorrhoid donut pillow. It does run small I am a petite woman and I could hardly sit on the pillow. It’s not very wide. It is very very hard so if you’re looking for a softer doughnut pillow I would look someplace different. I am hoping that it will soften up but I doubt it. With the coronavirus right now I am not returning because it’s not worth it to me. I’m stuck with a hard pillow I don’t like to sit on. Just doesn’t work for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law has been in a great deal of pain due to having cancer. I ordered this pillow for him and he said it is wonderful. It has significantly reduced his pain while sitting and he takes it everywhere he goes. This product has been extremely helpful for him. Definitely worth a try if you are in the same situation - he has told me how great it is multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is awesome. The reviews about it being too firm kinda ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is awesome. The reviews about it being too firm kinda worried me, however this is not the case at all. Yes it doesn't squish down as quickly as other tailbone relief pillows, but thats the point. If it sinks down too much, you aren't getting any support! I love this thing, i haven't had any tailbone pain since i got it 2 days ago. Should've bought it a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bridges

customer_reviews.title: This Pillow is Oval, Not as Round as it Looks in Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Way wider than what it looks like in photos. It is actually an oval, not a circle. The hole is so wide, I fit right through it!...I am 70lbs overweight, so I am not small. To try to make this work, I turned the pillow long-ways. BIG MISTAKE. I had lower back pain (on top of the pain from my tailbone!) for 3 days straight. So, don't make the mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: A Great Relief
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for use with a pressure wound and it is an amazing donut pillow. It is very comfortable and treating my problem nicely. I’m happy I ordered this and that I will have it in the house if and when needed again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Discomfort Down There
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby a couple weeks ago and was having trouble sitting normal afterward. I bought this and it has been a lifesaver on the couch and in the car. Sturdy enough to keep my bottom off the surface but soft enough to be comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I am 33wks pregnant and this pillow seat has been a lifersaver for my tailbone pain. Without it I can sit for about a max of 30min before excruciating pain sets in which makes car rides and going to restaurants or any place that requires sitting longer than that impossible for me. This is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Akoboe

customer_reviews.title: Like sitting on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! My husband and I started fighting over it so I bought another one for him to use! We are both very happy customers. Very high quality materials, easy to zip off and clean the cover. Fits nicely over wheeled luggage handles. I will never fly without this again!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best cushion by far
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite cushion. I've bought and returned several because they were either too hard or just plain uncomfortable. This one is awesome. Works great for taking pressure off your bottom when you have to sit all day at a desk. I'll be buying another one for my chair at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Y

customer_reviews.title: Cover rips when washed
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star rating...but the cover ripped. My poor aunt has rectal cancer and was thrilled with the comfort of this cushion. She even sleeps with it...but with all the chemo and radiation she has...the cover has to be washed...and it didn’t withstand the washing. The zipper broke...during the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design and entirely too thick and firm
customer_reviews.text: This device is entirely to firm and uncomfortable, I wanted to send it back but there was no packing/return slip. Also, because it’s so thick and firm it is impossible to place the lower spine above the indentation, horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Hate it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredibly STIFF. This is basically a step and a half away from sitting on a toilet seat. It's also quite large.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: It's the best cushion I've found for sore back
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is so soft and protects my back. I have 6 spinal fractures that are trying to heal. Please remember to take your meds to help your bones absorb calcium in your body. I have four other cushions to use for sore back and tailbone, but this is my favorite. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: genealover

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It's a hard cushion. Quite hard. I got it to help with comfort driving super long distances. It just doesn't fit in the car seat right. It's better than nothing, but only if I keep moving it around so that I'm changing up how I'm sitting on it. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mandi

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a while now and bought a second one for my office chair at work. Makes sitting so much comfortable. I am 270 pounds and this thing has taken my weight on a daily basis. Would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after surgery when laying down was the only comfortable position and was amazed how much of a difference this made for me to sit without pain. Even went on a 3-hour car ride that wouldn't have been possible without it. When I healed, I gave it to my dad who has chronic back pain. He sits on it daily and noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without it.
customer_reviews.text: Recent prostate issues have left me tender in the perineum. Use it every day on my office chair, sofa, dining room chair and car. Highly recommended. This cushion would help with any issues in the south 40. Do not hesitate to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Bass

customer_reviews.title: Won't be looking for another product...
customer_reviews.text: I needed help with a tail bone problem so have been trying different products. This is one of the best. Pain goes away most of the time. I guess there are limits to what a product can do. The padis mostly soft but there is a time limit for me. Given that I won't be shopping for another product anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: MontereyJoe

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Unconventional use - got to eliminate pressure on a surgical site, by locating that in the hole in the cushion and building up all around with pillows. Worked for that. Would probably be good for intended purpose as well. Seems to be a quality product, well constructed and finished.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Not for lower back pain!!
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable for back pain. The tailbone touches the pillow edges and make pressure on the spine when I sit on. I’m 105 pounds and when I sit the pillow flattens. Do not recommend for back pain or tailbone pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cacau

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKED
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 months pregnant. She was having a really hard time sitting at her desk all day.....she was in a lot of pain. So after a little research I purchased this donut cushion. It really worked for her. She said the pain on her tailbone was practically eliminated 100%.
customer_reviews.author: BDJ

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this in stores, arrived quickly and is super comfy. Ergonomically shaped and soft but with enough firmness to offer a fair amount of support, made of a good material that doesn't stink (well, at least before I sat on it haha ;)
customer_reviews.author: basalawarmi

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pelvic floor dysfunction as well as interstitial cystitis and sitting at my office chair or at the dinner table, or in a motor vehicle seat is very uncomfortable. This pillow is awesome. I need one in every color and for each room in my home.
customer_reviews.author: DORABETHE BAYS

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I have an enlarged prostate sitting over and hour is uncomfortable this helps but is not a complete help the issue doesn’t go away you can only make it better some how so this pillow was worth the money to turn that hour into maybe and hour and a half or two
customer_reviews.author: Black Ma$k

customer_reviews.title: it is firm and should be to support your body weight, works great
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery and it was suggested to use this. Considering I had to travel this did work and I was able to use it to drive my car myself a little while after. Worked as intended, it is firm and should be to support your body weight
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for after birth!
customer_reviews.text: This was a miracle pillow after I gave birth, and spent das unable to be comfortable sitting on our couch or any surface. I felt like I wasn’t recovering as fast as I should, but as soon as I started using this, I got better overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Danzer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for aching rhoids
customer_reviews.text: Truly smells terrible when delivered due to the foam insert. Tried airing it out but decided I needed comfort more than no smell. Very comfortable. able to finally sit down without pain. Ordered a second one. will see how long it takes to remove the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Locke

customer_reviews.title: You should make it at least an inch thicker.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it at all because it isn't thick enough to keep my rear end off the surface the cushion is sitting on. So, I bought a 2nd one to see if I could stack them and solve this problem. Also, you should warn people that if they take off the cover it is very difficult to get it back on and you can easily break the zipper which, I did on the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for sure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bruised her tailbone falling out of bed. It has been hurting for 3 weeks. We bought the donut because we read it would help alleviate the pain. She says she sees an improvement in healing with it. Recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Pearls' Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: My husband had his prostate removed and has been using this post surgery. He said to give it five stars and he likes it enough that he is going to order one for when he goes back to work. So there you go!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Parkinson’s disease. He sits most of the day. After trying many different cushions without success Then I found this one. No more sores! Can’t thank you enough for making a great product
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not new
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping it would help with chronic hamstring tendonitis. The cushion is soft and it's better nothing. The shape isn't exactly perfect for me. But my main complaint with this order is that even though it was wrapped in plastic, it was dirty with some flaky white stuff and a hair. I purchased what I thought was a new product. At least have the decency to clean it off before you repackage something.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's very good on hard surfaces. The only downside is that it's tough to pivot or move, it's really only good in one position, so if I want to change positions I have to stand up and physically change the position of the donut.
customer_reviews.author: Katykey

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for bubble buddies
customer_reviews.text: The product is soft but is not firm. I was waiting desperately for this pillow because I work a sedentary job for 10-11 hours a day and 6 days a week. I brought this for hemorrhoidal problems. It is not thick enough. The donut hole to prevent my from sitting on my tush, is not preventing anything. I am really disappointed because I am constantly in pain. I may have to return the product
customer_reviews.author: Dreydrey

customer_reviews.title: Needed Post Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I had a surgery and needed something that would allow me to begin to sit upright for long periods of time. I purchased this donut cushion and it has been a life saver. It allowed me to sit comfortably on an airplane, in the car and also in my home. I have used it constantly and it still looks great and has held it's shape. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: The design does allow for comfort for issues like a broken tailbone or hemorrhoids. My reason for the 1 star review is that the pillow is so stiff that it is uncomfortable to sit on. Unfortunately, I really don't think I will be using this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: MomClrH2o

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any chair
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I bought a second one. 1 for office, and one for home. Really helps with chairs you don't have control over ( office) and being able to sit comfortably, without too much pressure on your tailbone. I have a desk job, so 8-9hour days, this thing is a huge help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, just not right for me
customer_reviews.text: The product feels well made and arrived on time, but it actually increases my pain. That said, I have a problem other than a hemorrhoid, so this might be great if that is your issue.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: A real life changer seriously
customer_reviews.text: When I would sit for long periods my tailbone would hurt unbearably so and that is on my mesh computer chair. This completely eliminates that problem with the hole in the middle you tailbone never even contacts the chair. It is a game changer. You might want to pair it with a back rest cusion as well because the hole will have you sit more forward in the chair not uncomfortably so but your back might not be able to touch the back of the chair as easily without being at an awkward angle.
customer_reviews.author: TheKoalaPunter

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow isn't big enough to support your butt very well. I'm not heavy - just 145 pounds. Invest in 1 that is large and has the hole in the back like the comfilife pillow.
customer_reviews.author: cmd

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: It kept sliding out from underneath my hubby when he used it ~ not sure if too stiff or just made different but it wasn't comfortable at all . A pillow worked better than this so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: SamIam

customer_reviews.title: Cushion does the trick—
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cushion for a friend who is suffering with a coccyx sore. She states she is very happy with it and is using it a lot. Takes it with her to her outings, and uses it at home to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Found this to be extremely stiff and uncomfortable. Left my bottom feeling numb. Gives off a weird smell.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine F.

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Kieba Hemorrhoid Treatment Donut Tailbone Cushion, and it is comfortable! I think it's a good product and would recommend it to others. ajp
customer_reviews.author: Althea J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best donut pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well, if you need a donut pillow, this is great. Helped during the flaring times and is extremely comfy. The pillow also does not get flat after long periods of use so in your times of need, this will help.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I found this pillow to be pretty uncomfortable. It does take pressure off of areas ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this pillow to be pretty uncomfortable. It does take pressure off of areas that don't want pressure, but the pillow seems to be too small and tends to dig into my backside because it is not soft enough. I am a tall person, but my butt is of a normal size and it really can feel uncomfortable if I have to sit on the pillow for a couple of hours or so. I would not think that anyone with a big butt would like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I sit a lot and I have hemorrhoids. Thought I would try a cushion designed for this to see if I could sit more comfortably. I am very happy with the results. I wish I had thought of this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Walter

customer_reviews.title: Relieves butt and lower back discomfort from sitting for too long!
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is wonderful! I spend a lot of time sitting and working on the computer or sitting in the car driving and often my lower back and butt/tailbone would start to hurt and feel uncomfortable. I tired sitting on a normal pillow but that didn't hep much. Another great thing about this cushion is that it does not slide around. It stays in place both in my car (leather seats) and on wooden chairs. Highly recommend! I've been using this product for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Combs

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY FOR POSTPARTUM!
customer_reviews.text: Started using this a couple of weeks prior to giving birth and a couple of weeks thereafter. Helps monumentally after vaginal birth when everything is just crazy sore!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Shore

customer_reviews.title: ahhhhh
customer_reviews.text: game changer. its strong and soft enough to be comfortable while supporting me up and taking the pressure off a very uncomfortable zone. It was worth the Express international shipping payment.
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed because it was rated #1 and I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the Kiera Hemmorrhoid donut. I was so disappointed because it was rated #1 and I expected it to help with my hemmorrhoidal and tailbone pains. It was WAY too firm and too thick. I am 5’3” tall and when I put it on a chair my feet barely touched the ground which added more pressure to my lower back and it actually cut into my hips. I believe a product like this needs to be tailored to a person’s body. One size does not fit all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Cushion is the perfect size and firmness. it does not slide around due to the nice slide proof bottom. I like that the cover can be removed and laundered. It did have the new foam smell. I just let it air out for a day or so and the smell was much less.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Terry

customer_reviews.title: Short sits great
customer_reviews.text: Work good but not good for long periods of sitting ,it squishes completely flat, other than that it's a good product , wish it was a little firmer for the price
customer_reviews.author: Doug murry

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT. The cushion is NOT soft ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IT. The cushion is NOT soft.I am not a jaded or normally a negative reviewer. The cushion is honestly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A MIRACLE WORKER 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I know this donut cushion is used for older people but i been having a lot of butt pain lately so i needed a donut cushion. Some reviews were saying how the donut was hard so, i was scared to buy it. At the end, I decided to purchase it which was one of the BEST decisions of my life. I went from extreme butt pain to normal. I highly recommend this soft, comfortable donut cushion. Plus I used free 5-8 business day shipping and it came in two days. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for postpartum recovery!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this donut pillow a couple days after having a 10lb baby and was having a tough recovery. This pillow was a game changer. It is extremely comfortable and has immediately helped with my recovery. I highly recommend this pillow for anyone recovering from some tender areas "down there."
customer_reviews.author: VHLR

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s too soft. At 150lbs, it’s doesn't give any support
customer_reviews.author: Thisgirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these in several chairs in our house and it helps him not to have sacrum and tailbone pain. We move them around as he needs them.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Firm!
customer_reviews.text: It's very firm. If that's what you're looking for this is it. It will keep it shape. It might feel better on the back of your legs if you keep them elevated. We were looking for something for a bruised coccyx and ultimately found that thewas the best choice. Of course we will hang on to this one because we are hoarders and it may come in handy for some hemorrhoid down the road.
customer_reviews.author: S to the C

customer_reviews.title: Ask your Dr. What kind of pillow you need after surgery
customer_reviews.text: For me this Is not the right product instead of giving me support it pushes it out so please consult your doctor on what kind of pillow you're really need after your procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Newton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my tushy from not only the pain of my hemorrhoids but also from using my stiff dining table chair as a make-shift work station for the COVID-19 quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tolle

product_meta.title: Kieba Hemorrhoid Treatment Donut Tailbone Cushion, Prostate Pillow, Pregnancy, Post Natal, Bed Sores, Coccyx, Sciatica, 18 Inches. Ultra Premium Comfort Foam (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThis ultra premium comfort foam donut cushion will add relief and comfort to any seat. The specially designed donut cushion with coccyx cut-out relieves pain and tension from hemorrhoids, pressure ulcers, lower back pain and provides hours of comfortable sitting.

Made from the highest quality foam, this cushion will not flatten out from prolonged use like other cushions. The non-slip bottom keeps the seat cushion in place on any surface. The breathable velour cover can be removed from the bottom zipper for easy cleaning. 

Recommended for: 
Relief from hemorrhoids 
Prostatitis, Prostatectomy, Prostate Biopsy 
Pregnancy & Child Birth
Bed Sores 
Relief of pain, tension, or numbness from prolonged sitting 
Fractured, bruised, inflamed, or broken tailbone 
Pelvic and hip pain relief 
Relief of sciatic tension and nerve damage 
Herniated, slipped, or bulging discs
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM RELIEF AND COMFORT - Reduces pressure on pelvic, coccyx, lower back, and perineum. Relieves pain from hemorrhoids, pressure ulcers, prostatitis, pregnancy, child birth, and lower back pain.

DURABLE - Made of dense premium comfort foam. Will not flatten out with prolonged use. Will not deflate like inflatable donut cushions. Non-slip bottom ensures the cushion stays in place and will not shift or slide on any surface.
ERGONOMIC - Promotes good posture and healthy weight distribution for hours of comfortable sitting.
USE ON ANY SEAT - Great for use on any chair, car seat, plane, and wheelchair.
EASY CLEANING - Removable velour cover is machine washable for easy cleaning.
